name: Noodles With Egg and Parsley Topping
keywords: eggs, noodles, parsley, nut-free, vegetarian, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1 hard-cooked egg, peeled and coarsely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the noodles in salted water until tender. Drain and add 1 tablespoon of the butter, salt and pepper. Toss well.

Heat the remaining 2 tablespoons of butter in a skillet over medium-high heat, and add the chopped egg and nutmeg. Cook briefly, shaking the skillet. Add the parsley, and cook for 30 seconds. Pour over the noodles and toss. Serve immediately.
